title: Making gene therapy delivery safer and more efficient

title_detail.value: Making gene therapy delivery safer and more efficient

summary: Viral vectors used to deliver gene therapies undergo spontaneous changes during manufacturing which affects their structure and function. As gene therapy approaches become more common for treating disease, managing consistency of the molecular makeup of the virus particles that deliver genes is a key concern in manufacturing on a larger scale.
